text: kesemayi wihani āwerede፡፡ shelek’owochumi bemet’enachewi fesesu፡፡ gorifumi āsefafīwini korefati teshekeme፡፡ legēt’i weyimi le‘ik’a filagoti be’irisu layi isati yemīyanedubetimi (ma‘idini) bit’ēwi yeẖone korefati ālilewi፡፡ inidezīhu ālahi le’iwinetina lewisheti misalēni yaderigali፡፡ korefatuma gibisibisi ẖono yit’efali፡፡ lesewochi yemīt’ek’imewima bemidiri layi yik’oyali፡፡ inidezīhu ālahi misalēwochini yigelit͟s’ali፡፡
